class C1;
	rand integer x;
endclass

class C2;
	rand integer y;
endclass

module top;
initial begin
	C1 c1 = new();
	C2 c2 = new();
	integer z;
	void'(c1.randomize());
	// z = $random;
	void'(c2.randomize());
end
endmodule
